main-section.title: Hello, I'm
main-section.name: Ronald
main-section.description: An enthusiastic web and mobile developer. Currently, I'm immersed in learning React and React Native, using technologies like Next.js and Expo.

training-section.academic-description: Graduated from the Computer Systems Engineering degree at the University of El Salvador.
training-section.self-taught-description: Self-taught, I have acquired knowledge in web application development using React and React Native. Additionally, I have explored the use of tools such as Firebase, TailwindCSS, Supabase, among others. I have also developed skills in using version control tools like Git and GitHub.
training-section.english-description: Basic knowledge of the English language. I am currently in the process of learning the language.

working-section.title: What I'm doing?
working-section.description: I'm currently updating 'Eco' with Expo SDK 50 and Expo Router v2, while implementing changes to functionality, design, and adopting TypeScript. I am also developing a website for a restaurant.

eco.title: Eco
eco.description: Eco is a mobile application developed with React Native and Expo. This application enables users to track their expenses and income, set savings goals, and maintain a daily record of their activities.

family-business.title: Family Business
family-business.description: This is a web application developed with Next.js and TailwindCSS. It is intended to be used by a family business to manage its products, and sales. The information is stored in a PostgreSQL database and the application is hosted on Vercel.

sh.title: SH
sh.description: It is a web system developed with Supabase and Next.js, it arises as a final project of the 'Computer Project Management' subject, it mainly has pharmacy control, appointments and medical consultations..

restaurant.title: Restaurant
restaurant.description: It is a website developed with Vite and Firebase, it is a project developed with a multidisciplinary team in which I am part of the development team.
